creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: bag: black with red and multicolored embroidery; 3 wide bands of embroidery on front with 3 smaller bands on each side, froming loops; four shell buttons and four raised metal discs finish design; black bag lined with coarse, heavy tan fabric; 15"-16" woven and knotted fringe down front; geometric embroidered patterns; sash/strap: black and white; black sash with 11" of white embroidery on one end; floral and geometric designs; pointed end edged in bright pink (looks very Nordic)
dimension:
11 1/2 x 13 1/4 in. (29.21 x 33.66 cm) (object part, bag only)
59 1/2 x 3 1/8 in. (151.13 x 7.94 cm) (object part, sash/strap only)
title: Bag with Sash/Strap
